Uses of Class
math.Vec4

  • Packages that use Vec4 
    Package Description
    examples.particles  
    math
    Provides basic mathematical components for computer graphics: 2-, 3, 4- dimensional vectors, 3- and 4-dimensional matrices and Quaternions
    math.function
    Provides functions interface for different kind of functions
    renderer
    Provides Render engines implementing the graphical interface.
    scenegraph
    Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes.
    util
    Provides various utilities (like Object Loading, to import a 3D mesh made in a 3D modeling tool like Maya).

    • Uses of Vec4 in examples.particles

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Vec4 TestSpring.createRandomVec4UnitCube()

      Vec4 Vec4.abs()
      Discards the sign of each component.

      static Vec4 Vec4.cross​(Vec4 left, Vec4 right)
      Computes the cross product by only using the xyz-components of the given vectors.
      Vec4 Vec4.max​(Vec4 vec)
      Returns a vector containing the component-wise maxima

      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      v1.max( v2 ) = [3, 5, 2, 1]
      static Vec4 Vec4.max​(Vec4 left, Vec4 right)
      Returns a new vector containing the component-wise maxima
      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      max( v1, v2 ) = [3, 5, 2, 1]
      Vec4 Vec4.min​(Vec4 vec)
      Returns a vector containing the component-wise minima

      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      v1.min( v2 ) = [0, 0, 1, -2]
      static Vec4 Vec4.min​(Vec4 left, Vec4 right)
      Returns a new vector containing the component-wise minima

      v1 = [0, 5, 1, 1]
      v2 = [3, 0, 2, -2]

      min( v1, v2 ) = [0, 0, 1, -2]
